title: Looking for members for ranked 5v5 Team
body:
Hello! My team is currently looking for players to join that can play ALOT. We are a very serious team that are looking for dedicated players that will be willing to practice out side of ranked 5s on their role and will be willing to practice with other members.We are currently in need of a top ,support, and  jungle how ever if you play any other role feel free to post or message me in game because we still may accept other roles.

Requirements:
1)Must have a lot of availability. Preferably Monday-Wednesday  and Friday from 2-7(This is subject to change in about a month or so)
2)MUST BE DEDICATED THIS IS IMPORTANT
3)Must be willing to practice,have an open mind to others advice,watch videos to get better, etc 
4)Must have or be able to download teamspeak, we have our own team server so this is what well be using
5) MUST HAVE A MICROPHONE and have no issues communicating with other people. Please don't apply if you can't meet this requirement its really annoying
6)In the end of the day after practices and matches you have to accept your mistakes and work on them

If you would like to join just post a message here private message me in game =)

replies.body: im intrested too. i added you

> [{quoted}](name=SanKakU,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=LKBi5ViM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-20T23:23:29.464+0000)
>
> I'm interested.

add me in game =)
